description: Clair`s Dragonite is the evolved form of Clair`s Dragonair. It was sleeping in meadow when Iris` Dragonite was sent to find it. Iris` Dragonite crushed a flower in the meadow near Clair`s Dragonite and Clair`s Dragonite got mad at it for doing so. The two of them fought from that point on.
name: Kairyu (Ibuki)
